dataList.dlg: What do you say we have a drink together? It’ll warm you right up~
You’re an early riser, I see~ A little laziness wouldn’t hurt, you know?
A cup of tea is a must-have after a greasy meal~ So, would you care for some?
Will you retire for the night? Oh my… That outfit sure doesn’t look to be comfortable sleepwear… I’ll have to lend you one of my silk garments~
What I do at my job is mostly the same as my usual training… Yet I can’t help but feel fatigued when it is work.

I don’t particularly care for physical work. I only feel like it from time to time… Brewing tea is much more fun.
Back home, many occasions needed me to get moving whether I wanted it or not… Haha!

How to make a fire...? The key is not to question how.
There was no use wondering about things like that, I'm telling you~

You’re taking an interest in my tea leaves? Why sure, I can teach you~
Ah… I should mention that the tea sets and brews I have can be quite expensive… Um, are you alright?

If you’re interested in practicing our martial arts, I could help~
In fact, I’ve instructed a couple of my coworkers from Section 6, too~ I’m sure I’ll be a good teacher!
Hmm… What a lovely scent the sun’s rays exude~
I see~ I was starting to wonder when you’d bring this up~
With warmth—sometimes heat.
It’s time to flare up, isn’t it?
Is there anything you want to say?
With grace!
Their balance is broken!
Oh dear…
It burns bright!
Well, I… really could use… a warm cup… of tea.
I followed a nice scent.
No wonder the flavor was unpleasant…
Hm~ That gave me good exercise.
Oh my~ I guess I got a little more excited than I expected. Ahahah…
Come now, let’s move somewhere else for tea. These things just happen sometimes, no?
